title: Simple and scrumptious scones
ingredients: ['350g self raising flour', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '90g softened butter cut into thin slices or cubes', '90g caster sugar', '160ml milk', '1 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '50ml buttermilk or a squeeze of lemon juice', 'To glaze', '1 egg beaten with 50ml of milk']
